name: OSDI Proxy Layer
description: A proxy of the OSDI API for ActionKit, Blue State Digital, or VAN

USE_CRM.description: Which crm to use? Should be one of 'bsd', 'ak', or 'van'

SYSTEM_NAME.description: Please name this system for internal reference (my actionkit proxy)

READ_ONLY.description: Whether to make this proxy read only. If true, all POSTs, PUTs, and DELETEs are disallowed.

PROXY_BASE_URL.description: What url will this be deployed at?

OSDI_API_TOKEN.description: The API token used to authenticate requests to this server

AK_BASE.description: If using ActionKit, what's your base url? (https://something.my-organization.com/rest/v1/)

AK_USERNAME.description: If using ActionKit, what's your username with API access?

AK_PASSWORD.description: If using ActionKit, what's your password for the above username?

AK_DEFAULT_CAMPAIGN.description: If using ActionKit, what campaign should new events be created for?

AK_EVENT_URL_BASE.description: If using ActionKit, what's the base url for your events? (https://something.my-organization.com/campaign/event/)

BSD_BASE.description: If using BSD, what's your base slug? (myorganiation.cp.bsd.net)

BSD_APP_ID.description: If using BSD, what's your application id?

BSD_APP_KEY.description: If using BSD, what's the key for that application?

BSD_EVENT_URL_BASE.description: If using BSD, what's the base url for events? (https://secure.myorganization.com/page/event/detail/

VAN_API_KEY.description: If using VAN, what's your API key?

VAN_MODE.description: If using VAN, what mode will you be using it in? (Must be one of 'voterfile' or 'mycampaign'

VAN_APP_NAME.description: If using VAN, what is the application name corresponding to your API key?

VAN_DEFAULT_CONTACT_EMAIL.description: If using VAN, what would you like the contact email to be for an event host if one is not present?

VAN_DEFAULT_CONTACT_PHONE.description: If using VAN, what would you like the contact phone to be for an event host if one is not present?

VAN_DEFAULT_CONTACT_NAME.description: If using VAN, what would you like the contact name to be for an event host if one is not present?

ACTIONNETWORK_API_KEY.description: If using Action Network, what is your API key?
